title.rendered: Naa Peru Surya Naa Illu India

content.rendered:
Directed by Vakkantham Vamsi.

Written by Vakkantham Vamsi.

Cast Allu Arjun(Surya). Arjun Sarja(Rama Krishnam Raju (as Arjun)). R. Sarathkumar(Challa (as Sarath Kumar)). Anu Emmanuel(Varsha). Thakur Anoop Singh(Challa’s son). Boman Irani(Col. Sanjay Shrivastav). Sai Kumar(Mustafa). Pradeep Singh Rawat(PC). Harish Uthaman(PC’s brother). Krishna Murali Posani(Varsha’s uncle). Kasi Vishwanath(Varsha’s father (as Kasi Viswanath)). Satya Krishnan(Mustafa’s wife). Prabhas Sreenu(Challa’s henchman). Denzil Smith(Activist Politician). Elli Avrram(item number ‘Iraga Iraga’) . Joy Badlani(PC’s Henchman). Raja Chembolu(Krishna Kumar). Chad Geiger(Dancer). Hitesh Gwalani(Rich kid). Charu Haasan((as Chaaruhasan)). Jay Jha(Prisoner). Ravi Kale(Pradeep Negi). Joya Kazi(Dancer). Vennela Kishore(Kishore). Nadia Moidu(Satya). Rubina Naaz(Sakina). Sam Nagar(Terrorist). Rao Ramesh(Godafather). Vikram Sahidev(Anwar (as Vikram Sahadev)).Sairaj Suthari. Kelly Sweeney(Dancer (as Kelly Anne Sweeney)). Janaki Verma(Challa’s wife)

Language Telugu.

Producers K. Babu. Jatin Dharna. Sirisha Lagadapati. Sridhar Lagadapati. Nagendra Babu. Rajesh Shah. Hari Tummala. Bunny Vasu.

Production Ramalakshmi Cine Creations.
